subject: Re: [SAdev] Interesting approach to Spam handling..
body:
David Höhn wrote:
> Hello, have you seen and discussed this article and his approach?
> 
> Thank you
> 
> 
Yes. See the perl module Mail::SpamTest::Bayesian on CPAN, and the 
thread on sa-talk.
Matt.
